page.title: 08HOUSING..MODERNISATION
page.content: The McSeveny's live in a rented farm cottage owned by Pitbladdo Farm. It was originally two cottages but has been recently connverted into one. It wasn't fully modernised by the farm owners but Mr.McSeveny is currently modernising it. The kitchen is very small but he is fitting a wood burning stove. The wiring in the house is poor ,it has rising damp and needs a new roof. Central heating is being installed this summer. The cottage consists of one main lounge, one large and one small bedroom, a kitchen and the recently added bathroom! The farm track (from Pitbladdo) passes the cottage door and at the rear there is a garden of about 1/3 of an acre. Here the family grow vegetables although they get potatoes from the farm.
